hero.subline: Well-thought-out structure, fast performance, and clear user guidance.

valueProposition.label: Core Principles
valueProposition.description: I don't assemble templates. I engineer digital products from the ground up‚Äîwith a heavy focus on structural integrity, measurable performance, and uncompromising quality.

architecture.title: Systemic Architecture
architecture.description: No quick fixes. I build scalable foundations tailored to your specific ecosystem, ensuring long-term stability and clean codebase semantics.

execution.title: Precision Engineering
execution.description: Every line of code serves a purpose. High performance, zero bloat, and a relentless focus on an immaculate user experience.

scalability.title: Built to Scale
scalability.description: Products designed not just for today's launch, but architected to handle tomorrow's growth seamlessly.

work.sectionSubtitle: Two real client projects. From brief to launch.

wt-erdbewegungen.title: WT Erdbewegungen
wt-erdbewegungen.problem: No digital visibility. Potential clients couldn't find the company locally.
wt-erdbewegungen.approach: A targeted, mobile-optimized business website focused on services and local SEO.
wt-erdbewegungen.outcome1: üöÄ Load time under 2 seconds on smartphones
wt-erdbewegungen.outcome2: üìà Visible ranking for local search queries
wt-erdbewegungen.outcome3: ü§ù First digital touchpoint for new construction projects
wt-erdbewegungen.testimonial: ‚ÄúFinally we are found online ‚Äì and the site looks great on every phone.‚Äù

daisymays-salon.title: Daisy May's Salon
daisymays-salon.problem: Unstructured inquiries via social media & phone. No central hub for services and pricing.
daisymays-salon.approach: A bilingual, modern website that answers all client questions upfront and transparently lists services.
daisymays-salon.outcome2: üåç Clients find all information immediately in their native language
daisymays-salon.outcome3: ‚è≥ More time for the actual core business
daisymays-salon.testimonial: ‚ÄúOur daily routine is much more relaxed now that the most important client questions are answered directly via the website.‚Äù

about.bio1: Hi, I'm Axel. I build websites that don't just look modern, but serve as a digital sales representative for your business.
about.bio2: My mission is to give small and medium-sized businesses ‚Äì from trade shops to salons ‚Äì the digital presence they deserve.
about.bio3: No complicated jargon, just clear results.
about.whyText: I'm fascinated by solving real business problems with smart web solutions. A good website takes work off your plate, answers client questions, and brings in qualified leads while you focus on your craft.

clarity.title: Clarity
clarity.text: Transparent communication and processes without agency jargon.

performance.title: Performance
performance.text: Lightning-fast sites because your customers don't want to wait.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.text: Code that still works tomorrow and is easy to expand.

about.techText: State-of-the-art web foundation (React, Next.js, TypeScript) for maximum security, speed, and future-readiness.

lab.sectionSubtitle: A look into the engine room. Here I test innovative web technologies, performance optimizations, and interactive designs to stay ahead of the curve for my client projects. Whatever works here becomes a best practice in real projects.

contact.formDescription: Briefly describe your project. Bullet points are totally fine.
contact.benefit2Text: Costs and timeline discussed right away.
contact.benefit3Text: You'll know exactly what the next steps are.
contact.trustBadge: Your data is safe. We never send spam.

footer.llmContext: NuVioLabs is a web design agency in Kranenburg, Germany, specialized in Next.js, SEO optimization, and Conversion Rate Optimization for small and medium-sized businesses.

cost.q: How much does a new website cost?
cost.a: Every project is unique, but a standard website project starts at around ‚Ç¨1,500. We'll discuss the details in our first call to give you a reliable estimate.

duration.a: Usually 4‚Äì6 weeks from kickoff to launch. This depends on how quickly we receive texts and images from you.

hosting.q: Do I have to take care of hosting & maintenance?
hosting.a: No, if you'd like, I can handle the full hosting including technical updates, backups, and SSL certificates, so you can focus on your business.

cms.q: Can I edit the content myself later?
cms.a: Yes, I can integrate a simple CMS (Content Management System) if desired. This allows you to easily update texts and images yourself.

home.title: NuVioLabs | Web Design & AI Solutions for Local Businesses
home.description: I build fast, high-converting websites for trades, salons, and SMEs. More visibility. More leads. Secure your free consultation now.
